questions.skill_area: Describe Azure compute and networking services
questions.question: Explain the differences between Azure Virtual Machines and Azure Container Instances, and describe scenarios where each is more appropriate.
scoring_criteria: Describe what Azure Virtual Machines are and their management responsibilities.
Describe what Azure Container Instances are and their managed nature.
Discuss use cases for Virtual Machines (e.g., persistent workloads, full OS control).
Discuss use cases for Container Instances (e.g., short-lived, stateless workloads, microservices).
Mention differences in scalability, deployment speed, and infrastructure management.

questions.question: Describe how Azure Policy helps organizations enforce compliance and give an example of a policy that could be implemented.
scoring_criteria: Define Azure Policy and its enforcement of rules.
Explain how policies can assess and remediate non-compliance.
Describe assignment of policies at different scopes (subscription, resource group).
Give an example of a policy (e.g., only allow resources in specific regions).
Mention integration with compliance reporting or remediation actions.
